mapper.select: SELECT A.M_NO , A.ID , A.PWD , A.NAME , A.PHONE , A.EMAIL , A.ADDRESS , A.HINT_NO , A.HINT_A , A.M_ENROLL_DATE , A.M_MODIFY_DATE , A.PWD_CHANGED_DATE , TO_DATE(A.PWD_EXP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PWD_EXP_DATE , A.LOGIN_FAILED_COUNT , A.ACC_LOCK_YN , A.ACC_SECESSION_YN , A.ACC_SECESSION_DATE , B.M_NO REF_M_NO , B.AUTHORITY_CODE REF_AUTHORITY_CODE , C.AUTHORITY_CODE REF_AUTHORITY_CODE2 , C.AUTHORITY_NAME , C.AUTHORITY_DESC FROM MEMBER A LEFT JOIN MEMBER_ROLE B ON(A.M_NO = B.M_NO) LEFT JOIN AUTHORITY C ON(B.AUTHORITY_CODE = C.AUTHORITY_CODE) WHERE A.ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER_ROLE ( M_NO , AUTHORITY_CODE ) VALUES ( SEQ_M_NO.CURRVAL , #{authorityCode} )
